接口的使用
net.opentsdb.tools.ArgValueValidator

  • 使用ArgValueValidator的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    net.opentsdb.tools  

    • net.opentsdb.tools中ArgValueValidator的使用

      实现ArgValueValidator的net.opentsdb.tools中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ConfigMetaType
      Title: ConfigMetaType Description: Defines the recognized meta types for command line argument values
      static class  ConfigMetaType.BooleanValidator
      Title: BooleanValidator Description: Validator for booleans (true|false)
      static class  ConfigMetaType.BootLoadableClass
      Title: BootLoadableClassValidator Description: A validator for boot time loadable class names
      static class  ConfigMetaType.ClassListValidator
      Title: ClassListValidator Description: Validator for loadable class lists
      static class  ConfigMetaType.ClasspathConfiguredClassList
      Title: BootLoadableClassValidator Description: A validator for a comma separated list of classnames for which a supplementary classpath has been specified in a ConfigMetaType.FILELIST configuration item named the same as this one but with .classpath appended.
      static class  ConfigMetaType.ClassPathValidator
      Title: ClassPathValidator Description: A class path validator and ClassLoader factory Company: Helios Development Group LLC
      static class  ConfigMetaType.DirFileSystemValidator
      Title: DirFileSystemValidator Description: Validator for fully qualified file names where the parent directory must exist but the file is optional
      static class  ConfigMetaType.FileListValidator
      Title: FileListValidator Description: A validator for a list of existing files or accessible URLs
      static class  ConfigMetaType.FileSystemValidator
      Title: FileSystemValidator Description: Validator for files and directories
      static class  ConfigMetaType.IntegerValidator
      Title: IntegerValidator Description: Validator for integers
      static class  ConfigMetaType.ReadWriteModeValidator
      Title: ReadWriteModeValidator Description: Validator for ReadWrite Modes
      static class  ConfigMetaType.StringValidator
      Title: StringValidator Description: Empty validator for generic string values, used when we don't have a decent or practical validation routine
      static class  ConfigMetaType.TimeZoneValidator
      Title: TimeZoneValidator Description: Validates time zone typed configuration items.
      static class  ConfigMetaType.URLOrFileValidator
      Title: URLOrFileValidator Description: Validator for URLs or Files
      声明为ArgValueValidator的net.opentsdb.tools中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      ArgValueValidator ConfigMetaType.validator
      A validator instance for the meta type
